meya bindimata ho karmika adhyapanaya wenath magaka gaman karawimata palakayanta menma adhyapana baladharintada mahinda rajapaksha rajaya elambaena thek prabala awashyathawayak nowu bawada, deshapalanagnyayo piligatha yuthuya.1893 maradana karmika pasalen arambai merata karmika adhyapanaya wasara siyayak gatha weddith thawath sthana 37 ka sthapitha wuwa misa eya kisiseth rate anagathaye karmika adhyapanaya sandaha wu hidasa ho awashyathawaya pirawimata samath wuye natha. 1994 wana thek merata palakayo lowa sanwardhitha ratawala adhyapanaye prathishathayan pilibandawa ho awabodhayak labagena nothibuni. 1971 tharuna nagitima pilibada soya balu tharuna asahana komishan sabha warthawe nirdesha kriyathmaka karamin samagi peramunu rajaya aarambha kala jathika aadhunikathwa mandalayada ee awashyathawa sapayimata apohosath wiya.kannangara adhyapana sankalpaya thula bihiwu madhya widyalayanhi liwada, lohawada peshakarmanthaya aadi karmika adhyapanaye ‘a’yanna kiyannata ida salasa thibu bawada sathyayaki.
